name: Cotopaxi Dorado Half Zip Fleece - Women's
description:
This lightweight fleece is just the thing to take the edge off chilly fall mornings. With its trim design the Dorado fleece is great on its own, or layered under a shell in nasty weather.Made with recycled polyester and repurposed remnant fabric.½ zip design lets you customize airflow.Elastic piping at the collar and cuffsCotopaxi designates 1% of their revenue to provide grants for non-profits. Products are guaranteed to last 61 years—the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world.

        Sustainability
